{"id":1138641910,"question_id":3236,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1704555930,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1138641910/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Missing Integer Greater Than Sequential Prefix Sum","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int missingInteger(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();\n        for(int n : nums){\n            set.add(n);\n        }\n        int res = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n//         \n        int longest = 0;\n        int prefix = nums[0];\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n           \n            int j = i;\n            \n              Set<Integer> a = new HashSet<>();\n            int cur = nums[j];\n             a.add(nums[j]);\n          \n            while(j+1<len && nums[j+1]==nums[j]+1){\n               a.add(nums[j+1]);\n                cur += nums[j+1];\n                 j++;\n            }\n            \n            if(a.contains(nums[0]) && j-i+1>longest){\n                longest = j-i+1;\n                prefix = cur;\n                res = Math.min(res, prefix);\n            }\n            \n        }\n        // System.out.println(longest+ \" \" + prefix);\n        \n        while(set.contains(res)){\n            res ++;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n    \n    /*\n    [1,2,3,2,5]\n[3,4,5,1,12,14,13]\n[37,1,2,9,5,8,5,2,9,4]\n[14,9,6,9,7,9,10,4,9,9,4,4]\n    */\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-missing-integer-greater-than-sequential-prefix-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
